Package presentation.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
presentation.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, MouseListener, EventListener
public class MainController extends Object implements ActionListener, MouseListener
The MainController class handles the actions and events mainly related to the change of the card layout. It implements the ActionListener and MouseListener interface.
